original_text: For this is how the holy women who hoped in God used to adorn themselves, by submitting to their own husbands,
korean_text: 전에 하나님께 소망을 두었던 거룩한 부녀들도 이와 같이 자기 남편에게 순종함으로 자기를 단장하였나니

sentences.original_text: For this is how the holy women who hoped in God
by submitting to their own husbands,
